item.title: Reorganising Hugo Content and Aliasing
item.description: Revamping a website and organizing content can be challenging. Here’s how I restructured my blog posts into yearly subfolders using a Bash script, added Hugo aliases for seamless redirects, and simplified file slugs for cleaner URLs. This automation ensures better content organization and link integrity.
